body.p:
The PowerPak PDU is certified through ETL for the following standards:
UL 60950-1
CS 22.2 In addition, the PowerPak PDU is designed, manufactured, tested, and installed in compliance with the following standards:
UL67 UL50
UL489
UL 891
UL1561
IEEE 519-1991
ANSI C33.4
NEMA ST-20
NEMA AB-1
NEMA-PB-1
NEC
ISO 9001
CS57.12.91
The PowerPak PDU complies with the latest FCC Part 15 EMI emission standard for Class A computing devices.
